title: Barty vs Pliskova live stream: how to watch Wimbledon Women's Final tennis free and from anywhere
author: kevin-lynch
summary: World number one will play the Czech eighth seed
article: There's set to be a new name etched on the Women's Singles trophy at Wimbledon this afternoon as two top-tier stars who have yet to taste glory at the All England Club go head-to-head.

Read on as we explain how to watch this Wimbledon semi-final tennis online and get a Ashleigh Barty vs Karolina Pliskova live stream wherever you are right now - including ways to see the match absolutely FREE.
Current world number one Barty beat former champion Angelique Kerber 6-3 7-6 (7-3) before Pliskova came from a set down to defeat Aryna Sabalenka 5-7 6-4 6-4 to set up today's finale.
Neither player has reached this stage of the tournament before, while Pliskova has yet to taste Grand Slam glory, despite having once been world number one.
Barty has the edge in terms of previous encounters with Pliskova, with the Aussie star winning five of their seven head-to-heads.
The most recent of those meetings came in April in the Stuttgart Open quarter-finals with Barty prevailing after fighting back from a set down to win in three.
Watch all the drama unfold as it happens by following our Barty vs Pliskova live stream guide to watch Wimbledon 2021 tennis online today.

If you're abroad during Wimbledon, you'll likely find you're unable to access your domestic tennis coverage like you would at home. This isn't necessarily cause for alarm, but rather the result of geo-blocking - best understood as digital borders that restrict certain services and content to certain parts of the world.

Fortunately, there's a convenient way around this in the form of a VPN. This is a nifty bit of software that lets you swerve around these digital borders, thereby allowing you to globe trot and still access your preferred Barty vs Pliskova live stream. It's a completely legal workaround, very affordable, and super easy to use - allow us to explain more.
